data.title: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore, Pittsburgh

data.text:
How close is Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore to the nearest airport, Pittsburgh Airport?

With no traffic, the 12.9 mi drive between Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore and Pittsburgh Airport (the nearest airport) will generally only take about 0h 25m. If youâ€™re staying in a metropolitan area, you may see your drive time increase due to busy roads.

What is the best way for guests to get from Pittsburgh Airport to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore?

For the most freedom while visiting Pittsburgh, consider renting a car for about $36/day and parking it at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore where they offer parking spaces to hotel guests. Rideshare apps and taxis remain a very common solution for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore guests. This is often the most cost-effective method of transportation when visiting Pittsburgh.

Is there a pool at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore?

Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore has a pool for hotel guests. Generally, hotel pools have opening and closing times so be sure to speak to the front desk before using the pool.

How close is Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore from the Pittsburgh city center?

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore is just 0.1 mi away from the center of North Shore, Pittsburgh. From Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore you can easily get to other popular landmarks such as Heinz Field.

What is the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore phone number?

If you have questions or concerns about your stay, call +1 412 323 0300 to talk to a Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore front desk representative.

What is the check-out time at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore?

The standard check-out time at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore is 11:00 AM. Guests can usually check-in from 3:00 PM. Special arrangements may be available if discussed with the front desk.

How much does it cost to stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore, Pittsburgh?

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore room prices depend on your dates, room type and availability. The average price found recently is $185/night, with the best deals starting from $98/night. To see current deals, enter your dates in the form above.

Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore have a laundry service?

Yes, there are laundry services usually available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore, Pittsburgh. Guests can also use ironing facilities.

Is Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore close to PNC Ballpark?

PNC Ballpark is also a popular place to see in Pittsburgh. It is 0.1 mi from Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore.

Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore offer accessible rooms?

Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore provides accessible rooms for guests requiring them. Make sure to check the deals available on HotelsCombined for the latest availability.

Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore have free breakfast?

Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore offers free breakfast with some rates. Confirm the details of your reservation to determine if your rate includes free breakfast.

What is the cheapest month to stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore?

For the best chance to save money on your Holiday Inn Express & Suites Pittsburgh North Shore reservation, consider staying in January, when prices are typically at their lowest ($74).
